name: Salted Caramel Core
subhead: Sweet Cream Ice Cream with Blonde Brownies & a Salted Caramel Core

While Space Force works to get boots (back) on the moon, this cosmic concoction will launch your dreams into orbit. With fudgy astronaut cows & toffee meteors, space couldn't be any sweeter. Unless the moon was made out of sugar cookie dough. Which for this limited-time flavor, it actually is!

description: Our Belgian Chocolate gelato is made with melted, imported Belgian chocolate blended until smooth with fresh milk, cream, eggs and a hint of vanilla. When it comes to chocolate gelato, there’s good, there’s better, and there’s Belgian.

name: BLACK RASPBERRY VANILLA PARFAIT
description: This Layer was inspired by one of our favorite desserts – parfaits. It’s well-balanced and has a warm and satisfying taste that we are obsessed with. We start with Black Raspberry gelato which is crafted with black raspberry puree that comes from a farm in the Pacific Northwest. Next, we add oat crisps (which are similar to a crunchy oatmeal cookie) and a third layer of Blueberry sauce which is made from all-American blueberries. Finally we add a fourth layer of vanilla gelato and a fifth layer of oat crisps. We think this Black Raspberry Vanilla Parfait is the perfect dessert!
ingredients: MILK, SUGAR, CREAM, BLACK RASPBERRY PUREE, ROLLED OATS, COCONUT OIL, WHEAT FLOUR, WATER, TAPIOCA SYRUP, BROWN SUGAR, BLUEBERRIES, DEXTROSE, NATURAL FLAVOR, SUNFLOWER LECITHIN, CAROB BEAN GUM, GUAR GUM, VANILLA EXTRACT, PECTIN, RED CABBAGE JUICE CONCENTRATE (FOR COLOR), SALT

name: CARAMEL APPLE PIE GELATO
description: We start by steeping real cinnamon sticks in fresh milk and cream to make our delectable cinnamon gelato, then blend in bits of flaky piecrust, apple pieces, and a caramel swirl to create this one-of-a-kind Caramel Apple Pie gelato. Our methods might be Italian, but this recipe clearly leans American. This is special batch gelato, meaning it’s only available for a few months when it’s in season!
ingredients: MILK, SUGAR, CREAM, DEXTROSE, SKIM MILK, WHEAT FLOUR, CINNAMON, DRIED APPLES, CORN SYRUP, VANILLA EXTRACT, CAROB GUM, COCONUT OIL, BAKING SODA, EGGS, SALT

name: CARAMEL COOKIE CRUNCH GELATO
description: This is one of our best-selling flavors that people can’t get enough of (and we don’t blame them)! In our Caramel Cookie Crunch gelato recipe, we blend chocolate cookies into our delicious sweet cream gelato, then add a swirl of our one-of-a-kind dulce de leche. This caramelly combo results in one of our finest flavors to-date that will keep you coming back for more.

name: CHOCOLATE CHERRY CHEESECAKE
description: Cherry cheesecake is a classic dessert and we think our Chocolate Cherry Cheesecake Layer is a soon-to-be classic, as well. We started with a cheesecake gelato made with real cream cheese to taste exactly like cheesecake. In the second indulgent layer we added chocolate flakes to create a decadent texture. We followed this with a third layer of black cherry sauce made with U.S. grown black cherries. Next, we included another layer of cheesecake gelato. Finally, to replicate classic graham cracker crust, we crafted a fifth layer of graham cookie pieces.

description: Inspired by an affogato, Coffee Cookie Crumble, is a coffee lover’s dream. We began with cold brew gelato made with fair trade Brazilian and Colombian coffee beans and sprinkled in dark chocolate chunks. name: DARK CHOCOLATE CHERRY
description: This Layer was inspired by a cherry cordial and features the perfect pairing of dark chocolate and black cherry. We started with our Double Dark Gelato which features sophisticated hints of vermouth. Followed by chocolate flakes, a black cherry sauce, more Double Dark Gelato and a fifth layer of fudge truffles, this refined flavor is sure to please a crowd.

name: Natural Vanilla
description:
Our Original Vanilla Ice Cream. The way vanilla should taste! Breyers® Natural Vanilla is made with fresh cream, sugar, milk, and Rainforest Alliance Certified vanilla beans. Made with non-GMO sourced ingredients. Its distinctive taste brings out the natural goodness of your favorite fresh fruit desserts, like classic Apple Pie a la Mode or Peach Cobbler.

When William Breyer started his small ice cream business in Philadelphia in 1866, he based his recipes around simple and pure ingredients. Breyers® Natural Vanilla ice cream today still holds true to his ideals. What could be simpler than using ingredients like fresh cream, sugar, and milk? To make things even sweeter, the milk and cream are 100% Grade A and come from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*. We partner with our farmers all over America because milk and fresh cream are so important in one of our most popular ice cream flavors and the taste you love. We believe that the quality of our ingredients makes the most delicious vanilla ice cream.

Do you see those specks? Those are real vanilla beans. That heavenly vanilla in Natural Vanilla is also 100% sustainably sourced, so you can enjoy it even more, knowing that you’re supporting farmers and their families in Madagascar through our partnership with the Rainforest Alliance. We believe that the quality of our ingredients makes the most delicious vanilla ice cream.

Try Breyers® Natural Vanilla yourself and see if those vanilla specks and refreshing milk and cream can scoop up some smiles in your family. Want to give your dessert a twist? Check out our recipes at for fun and easy ideas!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.
ingredients: MILK, CREAM, SUGAR, VEGETABLE GUM (TARA), NATURAL FLAVOR

name: Homemade Vanilla
description:
Breyers® Homemade Vanilla ice cream is thick and smooth like it was just churned. It’s how homemade should taste, which makes it the perfect pairing to your favorite homemade treats. Try it with any one of our favorite recipes, like Rice Cereal Treat Ice Cream Sandwiches, Chocolate Chip Ice Cream Pies, or even a Banana Split Ice Cream Cake! Check out for more ideas!

Part of how we make Breyers® Homemade Vanilla so good is the high quality ingredients that we put in. We start with 100% Grade A milk and cream from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*. We partner with our farmers all over the U.S. because milk and fresh cream are so important in our ice cream flavors and the taste you love. We pledge to use only flavors and colors from natural sources, and sustainably farmed fruit and vanilla.

Give it a try and leave us a review at or follow us @Breyers on Instagram!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows. Breyers® Homemade Vanilla ice cream is thick and smooth like it was just churned.

name: Chocolate
description:
Dig into a mouth-watering scoop of Breyers® Chocolate ice cream to find out why it's America's favorite. Rich, creamy ice cream with just the right amount of sweetness and real cocoa! Who can resist our Breyers® Chocolate ice cream? That fresh cream taste in Breyers® Chocolate ice cream is thanks in part to our partnerships with American farmers, who ensure the highest quality of dairy for our desserts.

And that rich chocolate satisfying your taste buds? That’s real cocoa we use. In fact, we only use real ingredients and colors and flavors from natural sources. Starting with real high quality ingredients is what we think makes the best chocolate ice cream.

Try it and see if you agree! Or give Breyers® Chocolate a twist with one of our fun recipes at .

name: Natural Strawberry
description:
Sun-ripened California strawberries – so good! AND swirled around in delicious Breyers® ice cream? What could be better? Our Breyers® Natural Strawberry ice cream is packed with strawberries picked at the peak of happiness!

Did we mention that our strawberries are also 100% sustainably sourced? Our Natural Strawberry is delicious all around. name: Vanilla Chocolate Strawberry
description:
Vanilla ice cream. Chocolate ice cream. Strawberry ice cream. All in one!? Oh my! The Breyers® take on the classic Neopolitan ice cream is the best of 3 worlds! Our Signature Natural Vanilla, Chocolate and Strawberry ice creams come together in one delicious package. Whether one at a time or all three in a scoop, there’s something for everyone!

Breyers® Vanilla Chocolate Strawberry is even made with Non-GMO sourced ingredients! But it’s not just any ice cream, it’s Breyers® so you’ll know that it’s made with high quality ingredients like sun-ripened California strawberries, real cocoa, and 100% sustainable vanilla from Madagascar! Our milk and cream are 100% Grade A from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*. When our founder, William Breyer, started his ice cream operation in 1866 in Philly he was very concerned about the quality of the ingredients that he put into his ice cream. Some 150 years later we still follow his commitments to using high quality ingredients to make great tasting ice cream.

Give Breyers® Vanilla Chocolate Strawberry ice cream a try and let us know at !

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.

name: French Vanilla
description:
Ooo la la! It’s Breyers® French Vanilla ice cream! A classic twist on your favorite Breyers® vanilla. The signature taste of Breyers® French Vanilla was inspired by the traditional French custard, and is our richest, most indulgent Vanilla. It’s the perfect complement to delicious breakfast-style desserts, like French Toast a la Mode, French Vanilla Puff Pancakes, or a Fruit Salad Parfait.

Though inspired by French tradition, this tub of Breyers® still has a lot of American pride. Each Breyers® French Vanilla is filled with 100% Grade A milk and cream, from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*.

Try it yourself and leave us a review on ! Or follow us @Breyers on Instagram!

description:

Our Breyers® No Sugar Added Vanilla abides by our Pledge to use 100% Grade A milk and fresh cream from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones* and vanilla from sustainably sourced farms in Madagascar, in partnership with the Rainforest Alliance.

name: Vanilla Caramel
description:
Torn between sweet or salty for dessert? Give in to the perfect balance between the two in Breyers® Vanilla Caramel. A classic blend of rich vanilla and indulgent caramel. It’s our signature Breyers® Natural Vanilla ice cream with a luscious caramel swirl. What can be better?

That caramel is a delicious addition to our marvelous vanilla made with ingredients like fresh cream, sugar, and milk. Our milk and cream is 100% Grade A and comes from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*. We believe that the quality of our ingredients makes delicious desserts.

We hope that you try our Breyers® Vanilla Caramel and agree! Let us know by leaving a review at or follow us @Breyers on Instagram for the latest news and products!

name: Chocolate Mint
description:
Breyers® rich cocoa ice cream with swirls of real peppermint extract? Pass that Breyers® Chocolate Mint ice cream over this way! With the perfect combination of sweet and cool mint, this flavor is a must try!

Part of what makes our Breyers® Chocolate Mint so good is that real peppermint extract that we use! In fact, we only use colors and flavors from natural sources because we believe it’s what makes great tasting ice cream. We honor the spirit of the Pledge of Purity with our own pledge to use 100% Grade A milk and cream from cows not treated with artificial growth hormones* and sustainably farmed fruit and vanilla**.

We hope that when you give Breyers® Chocolate Mint a try you’ll agree that it’s our high quality ingredients that make a difference. Did you love it? Leave us a review at or follow us @Breyers on Instagram!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows. **In Breyers® Cookies & Candies, our product, before the inclusion of other cookies, candies, sauces or fruit from other suppliers, will abide by this claim. Raspberries are not sustainably farmed.

name: Peach
description:
Breyers® Peach - real juicy peach pieces mixed into creamy vanilla. A genuine taste of summer sweetness all year round!

Our secret to making this dessert so good? Real, 100% sustainably farmed peaches! But honestly, that’s just one part of the secret. The rest is in our high quality ingredients like fresh cream, sugar and milk. In fact, our cream and milk is 100% Grade A and comes from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*. And our vanilla is real and sustainably farmed in Madagascar. We work with Rainforest Alliance to help farmers in Madagascar earn a living.

We hope you give Breyers® Peach a taste and agree! Leave us a review at or follow us @Breyers on Instagram!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.

name: Vanilla Fudge Twirl
description:
Rich fudge swirled through creamy smooth vanilla makes for a 'twirling' good time in Breyers® Vanilla Fudge Twirl! Twirl around in enjoyment!

What makes our dessert this good? In part, it’s our vanilla flavor that comes from 100% sustainable farms in Madagascar and is certified by Rainforest Alliance. Our milk and cream play a big role in making a great tasting Vanilla Fudge Twirl. We partner with American farmers for only 100% Grade A milk and cream from cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*, colors and flavors from natural sources**, and sustainably farmed fruit and vanilla.

We hope you agree that’s what makes our Breyers® Vanilla Fudge Twirl so good! Give it a try and leave us a review at or follow us @Breyers on Instagram!

description:

name: Lactose Free Chocolate
description:
Have a lactose sensitivity? No problem! Try our Breyers® Lactose Free Chocolate! It’s the same great chocolate, just without the lactose*! A creamy, delicious dessert made with real cocoa.

That smooth creamy taste is in part thanks to our 100% Grade A milk and cream from American cows now treated with artificial growth hormones**. Mixed together with rich cocoa – makes that delicious Breyers® Chocolate that you know and love. We believe that the quality of our ingredients makes delicious chocolate desserts.

Try our Breyers® Lactose Free Vanilla and see if you agree! Leave us a review at or follow us @Breyers on Instagram!

name: No Sugar Added Vanilla Chocolate Strawberry
description:
Vanilla. Chocolate. Strawberry. All in one!? And with no sugar added? Oh my! The Breyers® take on the classic Neopolitan is the best of 3 worlds with the added bonus of no sugar added! Our Signature vanilla, chocolate and strawberry Breyers® come together in one delicious package. Whether one at a time or all three in a scoop, there’s something for everyone!

Breyers® No Sugar Added Vanilla Chocolate Strawberry is even made with Non-GMO sourced ingredients! But it’s not just any dessert, it’s Breyers® so you’ll know that it’s made with high quality ingredients like sun-ripened California strawberries, real cocoa, and 100% sustainable vanilla from Madagascar! Our milk and cream are 100% Grade A from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*.

Give Breyers® No Sugar Added Vanilla Chocolate Strawberry a try and let us know at ! *The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.

name: Non-Dairy Vanilla Peanut Butter
description:
Love ice cream but can’t stomach the dairy? Have no fear! Breyers® Non-Dairy Vanilla Peanut Butter is here! Made with real almond milk and filled with luscious swirls of real peanut butter – there’s no milk in sight. If you’re anything like us, you love Breyers® vanilla and spoonfuls of peanut butter. So why not combine your love into one tub with Breyers® Non-Dairy Vanilla Peanut Butter? And now, even those who usually shy away from delicious ice cream can rejoice and join in! Really, who can say there’s ever too much of a good thing – like peanut butter and Non-Dairy Breyers®? Rich, creamy vanilla goodness surrounds those beautiful swirls of peanut butter and will be sure to bring a smile to your face.

We hope you agree that our Non-Dairy frozen almond milk dessert packed with real peanut butter is simply a delightful treat. Give it a try and leave us a review at . Real vanilla and luscious peanut butter collide to give you a real Breyers® moment — and this time, it’s completely non-dairy, made with real almond milk! Enjoy this creamy and nutty almond milk frozen dessert, with the Breyers® quality you trust.

Try Breyers® REESE'S for yourself and leave us a review on , and follow us @Breyers on Instagram!

name: REESE'S & REESE'S PIECES 2in1
description:
REESE'S PIECES or REESE'S Peanut Butter Cups? When it comes to your favorite REESE'S candy, you don’t have to choose with Breyers® 2in1s. You can get the best of both REESE'S filled worlds – peanut butter Breyers® loaded with pieces of 100% REAL REESE'S Peanut Butter Cups, swirled together with chocolate Breyers® and loads of REAL REESE'S PIECES Mini Candies. It’s sure to be your new favorite dessert.

Using 100% REAL REESE'S Peanut Butter Cups and REESE'S PIECES® is just one way that we’re keeping to our pledge to use high quality ingredients. Our milk and cream are 100% Grade A and come from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*.

name: No Sugar Added Caramel Swirl
description:
Savor the flavors of vanilla and rich salted caramel and pieces of toffee swirled throughout Breyers® No Sugar Added Salted Caramel Swirl. All the rich, creamy taste—with no added sugar!

Breyers® No Sugar Added Salted Caramel Swirl is a great way to enjoy dessert time, without all the guilt. It’s the vanilla and caramel you love and expect from Breyers® plus chunks of toffee pieces, without sugar – what can be sweeter? Your sweet tooth can indulge in the smooth, creamy vanilla and caramel that has just the perfect amount of sweet.

Our Breyers® No Sugar Added Salted Caramel Swirl uses 100% Grade A milk and fresh cream from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones* and vanilla from sustainably sourced farms in Madagascar, in partnership with the Rainforest Alliance.

Check out to snag some near you and leave us a review to share your love!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.

name: SNICKERS®
description:
Breyers® joins forces with America’s favorite candy bar to bring you Breyers® SNICKERS®! Caramel ribbons, chocolate coated peanuts, and real SNICKERS® bar pieces are swirled together with smooth vanilla Breyers® for a dessert that can’t be beat.

The best news of all is that you can enjoy your favorite cookies and candies combined with the quality of Breyers®. All of our flavors are made with 100% Grade A milk and cream that comes from cows not treated with artificial growth hormones* because we believe the best ingredients make the most delicious products.

Try Breyers® SNICKERS® for yourself and leave us a review on , and follow us @Breyers on Instagram! *The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.

name: New York Style Cheesecake
description:
Can’t get enough of rich, creamy cheesecake? You’re in luck! Treat yourself to delicious cheesecake-flavored Breyers® swirled with luscious strawberry sauce and chunks of graham-covered cheesecake pieces.

Breyers® NY Style Cheesecake is made with 100% Grade A milk and cream that comes from cows not treated with artificial growth hormones* because we believe the best ingredients make the most delicious products.

Try Breyers® New York Style Cheesecake for yourself and leave us a review on , and follow us @Breyers on Instagram!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.

name: Rocky Road
description:
Deliciously gooey marshmallow swirled through rich chocolate Breyers® and real, chocolatey-covered almonds. Breyers® Rocky Road is the fastest road to fun! Love Breyers® chocolate ice cream? Well this dessert, made with rich cocoa will be sure to be your new favorite.

Our philosophy is to start with the high quality ingredients to make great tasting ice cream. In our Breyers® Rocky Road we start with 100% Grade A milk and cream from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*, colors and flavors from natural sources**, and sustainably farmed fruit and vanilla**.

Give it a try and leave us a review at or follow us @Breyers on Instagram!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows. ** Our product, before the inclusion of any candies, cookies, sauces or fruit from other suppliers, will fully abide by this claim.

name: Cherry Vanilla
description:
Take juicy cherries and add smooth and creamy Breyers® vanilla, for a delicious Breyers® Cherry Vanilla. Now that's a refreshingly delicious family-time dessert! Those chunks of juicy cherries are even 100% sustainably farmed and the great vanilla taste? It’s from the sustainable vanilla we source from Madagascar. Our vanilla is also certified by Rainforest Alliance, so you can feel good about helping farmers, while you enjoy your bowl! We believe that the quality of our ingredients makes delicious desserts.

Try Breyers® Cherry Vanilla yourself and leave us a review on ! Or follow us @Breyers on Instagram!

name: Cookies & Cream
description:
Take a milk and cookie break. Dive into Breyers® rich and creamy vanilla packed with scrumptious, cream-filled chocolate cookie pieces in Breyers® Cookies & Cream! That delicious vanilla taste mixed with chocolate cookies – what a combination!

Our vanilla flavor is pretty special – it’s 100% sustainably farmed in Madagascar and is certified by Rainforest Alliance! We work with Rainforest Alliance to help farmers in Madagascar take care of their farms and families. Find out more about our Vanilla Story at . 100% Grade A milk and cream from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*, colors and flavors from natural sources**, and sustainably farmed fruit and vanilla are all part of what makes Breyers® Cookies & Cream delicious!

Give it a try and leave us a review at or follow us @Breyers on Instagram!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows. **Our product, before the inclusion of any candies, cookies, sauces or fruit from other suppliers, will fully abide by this claim. Raspberries are not sustainably farmed.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
description:
With creamy vanilla and chunks of cookie dough, Breyers® Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough is sure to satisfy any craving! Less bake time, more play time! Chunks of chewy chocolate chip cookie dough folded into Breyers® creamy vanilla make Breyers® Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough a chunky, chewy taste-bud pleaser.

Chunks, chips, and vanilla? Not only delicious, but also made with high quality ingredients like fresh cream, sugar and milk. In fact, our milk and cream is 100% Grade A from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*.

Try Breyers® Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough and let us know what you think at !

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.

name: Non-Dairy OREO® Cookies & Cream
description:
Love ice cream but can’t stomach the dairy? Have no fear! Breyers® Non-Dairy OREO® Cookies & Cream is here! Made with real almond milk and filled with loads of 100% REAL OREO® cookies – there’s no milk in sight. If you’re anything like us, you love Breyers® vanilla and OREO® cookies. So why not combine your love into one tub with Breyers® Non-Dairy OREO® Cookies & Cream? And now, even those who usually shy away from delicious ice cream can rejoice and join in!

Really, who can say there’s ever too much of a good thing – like OREO® cookies and Non-Dairy Breyers®? Rich, creamy vanilla goodness surrounds those chunks of real OREO® cookies and will be sure to bring a smile to your face. We hope you agree that our Non-Dairy frozen almond milk dessert packed with OREO® cookies is simply a delightful treat. Give it a try and leave us a review at .

name: Coffee
description:
Enjoy Breyers® Coffee by the scoop and brew up good times! This delicious treat is made with fresh cream and rich, roasted Colombian coffee. Smooth and creamy, it’s a coffee lovers dream come true.

Part of what makes Breyers® Coffee so good is the high quality ingredients that we put into it! Through our partnership with American farmers we use 100% Grade A milk and cream from cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*. We start with ingredients like fresh cream, sugar, and milk, colors and flavors from natural sources, and 100% sustainably farmed fruit and vanilla.

Try Breyers® Coffee and let us know what you think at or follow us @Breyers on Instagram!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows. Enjoy Breyers® Coffee by the scoop and brew up good times! This frozen treat is made with fresh cream and rich, roasted Colombian coffee.

name: Vanilla Chocolate
description:
Breyers® Natural Vanilla ice cream and Breyers® Chocolate ice cream, together in one tub? It’s the best of both worlds! No need to choose your favorite dessert, when you can have both in one scoop.

It’s the simplicity of Natural Vanilla made with real Madagascar vanilla bean specks and Chocolate made with real cocoa. We believe that it’s the quality of our ingredients that makes great tasting ice cream. Just like William Breyer who, in 1866, started his ice cream operation in Philadelphia, we today also follow a commitment to high quality ingredients. More than 150 years later and we are still making your favorite Natural Vanilla and Chocolate with high quality ingredients.

Breyers® Vanilla Chocolate is also made with Non-GMO sourced ingredients. We start with 100% Grade A milk and cream from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*. We partner with our farmers all over the U.S. because milk and fresh cream are so important in our ice cream flavors and the taste you love.

Share your love for Breyers® Vanilla Chocolate at or follow us @Breyers on Instagram!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.
ingredients: MILK, CREAM, SUGAR, WHEY, DUTCHED COCOA (PROCESSED WITH ALKALI), VEGETABLE GUMS, TARA, CAROB BEAN, NATURAL FLAVOR

name: Chocolate Chip
description:
Chip out with rich and creamy vanilla Breyers® mixed with rich chocolatey chips! Breyers® Chocolate Chip, for those days when you don’t want something too complicated. The simplicity of vanilla and chocolate, in just the right combination, hits the spot!

Love that vanilla flavor? Well, its actually 100% sustainably farmed and comes from Madagascar. It’s even certified by Rainforest Alliance, so you can know that you’re doing a little bit of good for those farmers, with every bowl. Our vanilla is not the only special part of Breyers® Chocolate Chip. We partner with American farmers for 100% Grade A milk and cream from cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*. We believe that the quality of our ingredients makes delicious desserts.

Try Breyers® Chocolate Chip yourself and leave us a review on ! Or follow us @Breyers on Instagram!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.

name: Extra Creamy Chocolate
description:
Breyers® Extra Creamy Chocolate is our creamiest chocolate. Fresh cream and real cocoa come together to make your favorite treat creamier than ever before! Add it to Brownie Bowl Sundaes, Hot Fudge Sundaes, or blend it into a Creamy Chocolate Mojito Shake. Extra Creamy Chocolate makes them all extra dreamy.

Part of our secret, is the quality of the milk and cream that we use to make our ice cream desserts! We start with 100% Grade A milk and cream from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*. We partner with our farmers all over the U.S. because milk and fresh cream are so important in our ice cream flavors and the taste you love.

Try Breyers® Extra Creamy Chocolate yourself and see if you can scoop up some smiles in your family. Want to give your dessert a twist? Check out our recipes at for fun and easy ideas! Or follow us @Breyers on Instagram!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.

name: Black Raspberry Chocolate
description:
Mouth-watering black raspberry swirls and rich chocolatey chips come together to make Breyers® Black Raspberry Chocolate a luscious treat. Raspberries and chocolate go hand in hand, so our Black Raspberry Chocolate frozen dessert is a must to try.

Though deliciously pink, our products are made with only colors and flavors from natural sources*. We start with ingredients like fresh cream, sugar, and milk to make Black Raspberry Chocolate extra special. Breyers® Black Raspberry Chocolate combines fruit and chocolate in the best way!

name: Chocolate Truffle
description:
It’s every chocolate-lover’s dream! Savor the creamy, delicious taste of Breyers® dark chocolate ice cream and pieces of dark chocolate truffles in every bite of Breyers® Chocolate Truffle!

Chocolate on chocolate – what could be better? Breyers® Chocolate Truffle is made with real cocoa and 100% Grade A milk and cream from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*.

We hope you give Breyers® Chocolate Truffle a try and agree. Leave us a review at to let us know!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.

name: Salted Caramel
description:
Torn between sweet or salty for dessert? Give in to the perfect balance between the two with Breyers® Salted Caramel. Savor a scoop of smooth salted caramel goodness wrapped with a gooey salted caramel swirl for the ultimate salted caramel indulgence.

Have a sensitivity to gluten? No worries! Breyers® Salted Caramel and that delicious sea salt caramel swirl is gluten free! We care about the quality of the ingredients that use in our products and that’s why we have a Pledge to use high quality ingredients like 100% Grade A milk and cream from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*, colors and flavors from natural sources, and sustainably farmed fruit and vanilla**. We think it’s what makes Breyers® so good, and we hope you agree.

Give Breyers® Salted Caramel a try and leave us a review on or follow us @Breyers on Instagram!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows. **Our product, before the inclusion of any candies, cookies, sauces or fruit from other suppliers, will fully abide by this claim. Raspberries are not sustainably farmed.

name: Ice Cream Cake
description:
Breyers® Ice Cream Cake is bite after bite of one of America's favorite party treats. Between layers of our signature Breyers® Natural Vanilla ice cream, is Breyers® Chocolate Ice Cream, bursting with loads of chocolatey crunchies. It's the perfect treat for even the smallest occasion.

Our vanilla is 100% sustainably sourced and through our partnership with Rainforest Alliance so your Breyers® Ice Cream Cake is also supporting farmers and their families in Madagascar. We believe that the quality of our ingredients makes the delicious vanilla desserts, and that’s why we use 100% Grade A milk and cream from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones* and sustainably farmed fruit and vanilla**. Make it a party and try our Breyers® Ice Cream Cake for your next celebration!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows. **Our product, before the inclusion of any candies, cookies, sauces or fruit from other suppliers, will fully abide by this claim. Raspberries are not sustainably farmed.

name: Coconut Fudge
description:
Sweet, creamy coconut and coconut pieces get delicious with chocolatey fudge swirled throughout Breyers® Coconut Fudge. It's the best of both worlds!

Need a tropical escape with some chocolate swirled in? Here it is! We can almost feel the ocean breeze. While you’re imagining being by the beach, take note that Breyers® is made with 100% Grade A milk and cream from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*. We believe that it’s our high quality ingredients that make Breyers® Coconut Fudge so great! We hope you agree.

Give it a try and leave us a review at or follow us @Breyers on Instagram!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.

name: Chocolate Peanut Butter
description:
Delicious Breyers® Chocolate Ice Cream is thoroughly swirled through with real peanut butter, making Chocolate Peanut Butter one spoon-lickin' good ice cream, perfect for sharing….or not! It’s the Breyers® Chocolate ice cream you love with swirls of peanut butter. What could go wrong?

We start with fresh cream, sugar, and milk and real cocoa. We’re obsessed with the quality of the ingredients that we put into our desserts and that’s why we partner with American farmers for 100% Grade A milk and cream.

We hope you give Breyers® Chocolate Peanut Butter a try and agree. Leave us a review at to let us know!

name: Natural Vanilla Snack Cups 10ct
description:
Discover Breyers® Vanilla Ice Cream Snack Cups. Enjoy the delicious taste of America's favorite vanilla in a perfectly portioned 3 ounce serving.

What could be simpler than using ingredients like fresh cream, sugar, and milk? To make things even sweeter, the milk and cream are 100% Grade A and come from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*. We partner with our farmers all over America because milk and fresh cream are so important in one of our most popular ice cream flavors and the taste you love.Do you see those specks? Those are real vanilla beans.

That heavenly vanilla in Natural Vanilla is also 100% sustainably sourced, so you can enjoy it even more, knowing that you’re supporting farmers and their families in Madagascar through our partnership with the Rainforest Alliance. We believe that the quality of our ingredients makes the most delicious vanilla ice cream.

Try Breyers® Natural Vanilla yourself and see if you those vanilla specks and refreshing milk and cream can scoop up some smiles in your family. Want to give your dessert a twist? Check out our recipes at for fun and easy ideas!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.

name: Butterscotch Blondie
description:
Sweet blondie pieces scattered throughout subtle vanilla bring out the brown sugar and butter flavors of butterscotch. Breyers® Butterscotch Blondie is a butterscotch lover’s dream! How sweet it is to bite into pieces of blondies! And it’s even sweeter knowing that we put high quality ingredients into every tub.

Our milk and cream is 100% Grade A and comes from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*. We believe that the quality of our ingredients makes delicious desserts.

We hope that you try our Breyers® Butterscotch Blondie and agree! Let us know by leaving a review at or follow us @Breyers on Instagram for the latest news and products!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.

name: Chocolate Snack Cups 10ct
description:
Breyers® Chocolate ice cream - rich, creamy, with just the right amount of sweetness and real cocoa! Who can resist? It’s deliciously snackable in a perfectly portioned 3 fl oz. serving ice cream cup.

America loves chocolate ice cream and so do we! That fresh cream taste in Breyers® Chocolate ice cream is thanks in part to our partnerships with American farmers, who ensure the highest quality of dairy for our desserts.

And that rich chocolate satisfying your taste buds? That’s real cocoa we use. In fact, we only use real ingredients and colors and flavors from natural sources. Starting with real high quality ingredients is what we think makes the best chocolate ice cream.

Try it and see if you agree! Or give Breyers® Chocolate a twist with one of our fun recipes at .

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.

name: CINNABON®
description:
Calling all cinnamon roll lovers! We teamed up with CINNABON®, one of our favorite treats, to create our bakery-inspired Breyers® CINNABON®.

Bring home the magic of CINNABON® and Breyers® with swirls of gooey cinnamon roll flavor and delicious dough bites in a sweet cinnamon flavored base. It’s a twist on your classic CINNABON® cinnamon roll that will take your senses on a tasty trip.

Not only delicious, but also made with high quality ingredients like fresh cream, sugar and milk. In fact, our milk and cream is 100% Grade A from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*. We use colors and flavors from natural sources and only sustainably farmed fruit and vanilla**. Our commitment to using high quality ingredients goes back more than 150 years to give you a great tasting dessert.

Try out our Breyers® CINNABON® and let us know what you think at !

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows. ** Our product, before the inclusion of any candies, cookies, sauces or fruit from other suppliers, will fully abide by this claim. Raspberries are not sustainably farmed.

name: CarbSmart™ Caramel Swirl Bar
description:
Watching your grams of sugar or carbs? Try our Breyers® CarbSmart™ Caramel Swirl Bars, with 60 calories, 4g net carbs, 4g sugar, and 3g fiber+ per serving! Sometimes, you just need a treat that you can grab and go and maybe even eat in four bites!

We start with fresh 100% Grade A cream from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*. Our fruit and vanilla is sustainably farmed and we only use colors and flavors from natural sources. So, while you’re walking around and enjoying the 4 grams of sugar of a Breyers® CarbSmart™ Caramel Swirl Bar, you know that even after more than 150 years, we’re following the spirit of William’s Pledge of Purity.

We hope that you give our Caramel Swirl Bars a try and see if you love them! Or, give our other flavors a try like Almond Bars, Vanilla Bars, and our Fudge Bars!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows. +SEE NUTRITION FACTS FOR MORE INFORMATION +NET CARBS ARE CALCULATED BY SUBTRACTING TOTAL DIETARY FIBER AND SUGAR ALCOHOL FROM TOTAL CARBOHYDRATES

name: Layered Dessert S'mores
description:
Calling all S'mores lovers! Make sure you don't miss out on our Layered Dessert S'mores. We start with smooth Breyers® and stir in sweet graham pieces between two layers of chocolate with marshmallows.

Not only delicious, but also made with high quality ingredients like fresh cream, sugar and milk. In fact, our milk and cream is 100% Grade A from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*. Our commitment to using high quality ingredients goes back more than 150 years to give you a great tasting dessert.

Try Breyers® Layered Dessert S'mores and let us know what you think at !

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.

name: Layered Dessert Peach Cobbler
description:
Love peach cobbler topped with Breyers®? Then make sure you don't miss out on our Limited Edition Peach Cobbler Layered Dessert. We start with smooth Breyers® and stir in real buttery shortbread pieces between two layers of peach with peach pieces. The experience of peach cobbler topped with Breyers, all in one scoop!

Not only delicious, but also made with high quality ingredients like fresh cream, sugar and milk. In fact, our milk and cream is 100% Grade A from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*. We use colors and flavors from natural sources and only sustainably farmed fruit and vanilla**.

Try Breyers® Layered Dessert Peach Cobbler and let us know what you think at !

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows. **In Breyers® Cookies & Candies, our product, before the inclusion of other cookies, candies, sauces or fruit from other suppliers, will abide by this claim. Raspberries are not sustainably farmed.

name: Layered Dessert Brownie Cheesecake
description:
Love brownie cheesecake? What about Breyers®? Now you can get both delicious desserts in just one scoop! We start with smooth cheesecake Breyers® and stir in real cheesecake pieces and surround it by two layers of chocolate with brownies.

Not only delicious, but also made with high quality ingredients like fresh cream, sugar and milk. In fact, our milk and cream is 100% Grade A from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*. We use colors and flavors from natural sources and only sustainably farmed fruit and vanilla**. Our commitment to using high quality ingredients goes back more than 150 years to give you a great tasting dessert.

Make sure you don't miss out on our Breyers® Layered Dessert Brownie Cheesecake. Try it and let us know what you think at !

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows. **Our product, before the inclusion of any candies, cookies, sauces or fruit from other suppliers, will fully abide by this claim. Raspberries are not sustainably farmed.
